Class VisualRepresentor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • VisualRepresentor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class VisualRepresentor
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A class that was hacked away at to get the MFQ class visualized. It is designed around, hard-coded, and fully dependent on the MFQ class.
    Author:
    Min-Jae Yi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        cpuTimeRequired - Job's CPU time required

        Returns the index of the most recently added GUI job element.

        Returns the speed multiplier of the GUI. This changes the speed of the program overall.

        Returns whether the program is in paused state or not.

      • animateGUI

        public void animateGUI()
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Handles animating the GUI. Moves all GUI job elements to their proper places. MFQ calculating will pause until the animation is finished.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thread sleep interruption

      • decJobVisual

        Decrements the remaining time of the GUI job with the given index parameter.
        Parameters:
        n - Index of the job to be decremented

        Decrements the GUI CPU quantum.

        Parameters:
        queueLevel - Index of the queue to be shifted

        Throws:
